    Open-source Projects:

    1. TVDb

      TVDb app is extensively built using AngularJS to display available TV shows/movies premieres going to be aired. Have a look at the demo. Browse source code.

    2. GoSocial

      Published my first rubygem that provides a quick soultion to embed common social-widgets used too often in most web applications these days. It supports 12 outstanding widgets across 4 different social-media. Browse source code.

    3. Rails Starter Apps

      Created some of the basic starter Rails v4.1 apps with the latest available gems and best-practices. Share, learn and code, enjoy the stuff. Browse source codes: rails4-devise-pundit-bootstrap, rails4-devise-cancan-bootstrap, rails4-kickoff.
